long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Screen Time Tracker is your digital well-being companion, thoughtfully designed to help you maintain a healthy balance between work and rest. As we dive deeper into the digital age, it's crucial to ensure that we're not spending excessive hours in front of our screens without breaks. This extension does precisely that!

Not only does it keep an accurate log of your browsing time, but it also sends you gentle reminders every hour, suggesting you take a break. With its sleek design and user-friendly interface, you can quickly check how long you've been active on your browser.

Why choose Screen Time Tracker?
